# twitchr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

R wrapper for the Twitch API.

## Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("koderkow/twitchr")
```

## Examples

```{r}
library(twitchr)
```

```{r}
twitch_auth()
```

```{r}
cheermotes <- get_cheermotes(broadcaster_id = 41245072)

cheermotes
```

```{r}
videos <- get_videos(user_id = 27699280)

videos
```

## Thanks to

- [Freguglia](https://github.com/Freguglia/rTwitchAPI) for getting me started on the oauth code
